note.text: Hard to breathe through your nose for at least a week
Additional Information:  If symptoms continue after 2 days, consult your GP

resource.comment: Patient has phoned in to ask about a doctors face to face appointment, due to recent head pains that have been described as unbearable. The patient records show no history of migraine which has been confirmed by the patient today.
Asked patient to come into the surgery today for a urgent check up.
